articles.description: Darrell Clarke has led Port Vale to the League Two play-off final since returning to work after a close family bereavement and opponents Mansfield Town intend to show their support
articles.content:
Mansfield Town have announced plans to hold a minute of applause in the eighth minute of Saturday's League Two play-off final in support of former player and current Port Vale boss Darrell Clarke.

articles.title: England MU18s squad named for games with Austria, Wales and Croatia in June - England Football
articles.description: England MU18s squad named for games with Austria, Wales and Croatia in Zagreb in June
articles.content:
